ComicInfo.Title: After the Slumber
ComicInfo.Summary: The adventures of four close-knit college girls who share a bond beyond wine and hot tubs… within each of them lies a hidden beast of mythology. After an attack by bloody-thirsty unearthly knee-biters, the secret passengers boil to the the surface, unleashing ferocious powers of self-defense. The four friends are thrust unwillingly into a world of magic and monsters to tame the demons inside.
